DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety and efficiency of 20w 30w holmium laser device in treatment of 2-3 cm diameter kidney stones with Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery (RIRS).
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Safety and Efficiency of 20w and 30w Holmium Laser Device in Management of 2-3 cm Diameter Kidney Stones With Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery
DOC.criteria: patients who have 23 cm kidney stones patients who are between 1890 years old patients who have congenital urogenital abnormalities patients who have previous surgery history for urinary stones
